dashboards.description:
Provides analysis of audited actions for Oracle Databases monitored by Logging Analytics using Unified Database Audit Logs available in DB v12.2 onwards. Use this dashboard to understand user activity, schema changes etc.
Use add data to ingest logs.

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = OCI_Backup_Event_Source and 'Event Type' like '%end' | eval backup_status = if(Status != null, Status, LifecycleState) | timestats count by Datasource
'Log Source' = OCI_Backup_Event_Source | link 'OCI Resource Name', 'Event Type', volumeName
'Log Source' = OCI_Backup_Event_Source | timestats count as logrecords by Datasource

'Log Source' = OCI_Backup_Event_Source and 'Event Type' like '%end' | eval backup_status = if(Status != null, 'Volumes backup: ' || Status, 'DB Backup: ' || LifecycleState) | stats count as logrecords by backup_status

'Log Source' = OCI_Backup_Event_Source and Datasource = DatabaseService | fields -'Entity Type', -'Host Name (Server)', -'Problem Priority', -Label, -Entity, -'Log Source', Datasource, 'Compartment Name', DBUniqueName, LifecycleState, 'OCI Resource Name', BackupDestinationType, backupType, backupState, recoveryWindowInDays, DatabaseEdition, autoBackupEnabled, dbVersion, isCdb

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput: <title-text>Total Database Size</title-text> <title-text>Total DB Backup Size</title-text> <title-text>Total Databases</title-text> <title-text>Max Retention Period in Days</title-text>

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = OCI_DB_recovery_Logs | eval backupSpaceUsedInGBs = unit(backupSpaceUsedInGBs, gb) | eval backupSpaceEstimateInGBs = unit(backupSpaceEstimateInGBs, gb) | eval dbSizeInGBs = unit(dbSizeInGBs, gb) | link 'Database Name', DBUniqueName | stats latest(rcvCloudLocation) as rcvCloudLocation, latest(LifecycleState) as LifecycleState, latest(health) as DBhealth, latest(lastBackupDurationInSeconds) as lastBackupDurationInSeconds, latest(lastBackupTimestamp) as lastBackupTimestamp, latest(backupSpaceUsedInGBs) as DBbackupSpaceUsedInGBs, latest(backupSpaceEstimateInGBs) as DBbackupSpaceEstimateInGBs, latest(dbSizeInGBs) as dbSizeInGBs, latest(retentionPeriodInDays) as retentionPeriodInDays, latest(unprotectedWindow) as unprotectedWindow, latest('Compartment ID') as Compartment | eventstats sum(DBbackupSpaceUsedInGBs) as Total_DB_backupsize, distinctcount(DBUniqueName) as Total_DB_count, sum(dbSizeInGBs) as Total_Database_Size | fields target = ui -'Total_*' | fields -'Start Time', -'End Time', -Count

'Log Source' = OCI_DB_recovery_Logs | link 'Database Name', DBUniqueName | stats latest(rcvCloudLocation) as rcvCloudLocation, latest(LifecycleState) as LifecycleState, latest(health) as DBhealth, latest(lastBackupDurationInSeconds) as lastBackupDurationInSeconds, latest(lastBackupTimestamp) as lastBackupTimestamp, latest(backupSpaceUsedInGBs) as DBbackupSpaceUsedInGBs, latest(backupSpaceEstimateInGBs) as DBbackupSpaceEstimateInGBs, latest(dbSizeInGBs) as dbSizeInGBs, latest(retentionPeriodInDays) as retentionPeriodInDays, latest(unprotectedWindow) as unprotectedWindow, latest('Compartment ID') as Compartment | fields -'Start Time', -'End Time', -Count

'Log Source' = OCI_Database_INFO | link 'Database Name', DBUniqueName, Type, LifecycleState | stats unique(pdbName) as pdb_list, latest(lastBackupDurationInSeconds) as lastBackupDurationInSeconds, latest(lastFailedBackupTimestamp) as lastFailedBackupTimestamp, latest(lastBackupTimestamp) as lastBackupTimestamp, latest(recoveryWindowInDays) as recoveryWindowInDays, latest(backupDeletionPolicy) as backupDeletionPolicy, latest(characterSet) as characterSet | fields -'Start Time', -'End Time', -Count
